metadata.title: CVE-2021-46950 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:md/raid1: properly indicate failure when ending a failed write requestThis patch addresses a data corruption bug in raid1 arrays using bitmaps.Without this fix, the bitmap bits for the failed I/O end up being cleared.Since we are in the failure leg of raid1_end_write_request, the requesteither needs to be retried (R1BIO_WriteError) or failed (R1BIO_Degraded).

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
